items.name: weather-widget
items.title: Weather Widget
items.description: A weather widget displaying temperature, conditions, and additional weather details.

items.name: card-form
items.title: Card Form
items.description: A credit card payment form with card number, expiry date, CVV, and cardholder name fields.

items.name: pay-confirm
items.title: Pay Confirm
items.description: A payment confirmation block displaying amount, card details, and confirm/cancel actions.

items.name: order-summary
items.title: Order Summary
items.description: An order summary block displaying items, subtotal, shipping, tax, discounts, and total.

items.name: saved-cards
items.title: Saved Cards
items.description: A card selector for choosing a saved payment method with support for multiple card brands.

items.name: payment-success
items.title: Payment Success
items.description: A payment confirmation screen showing order details, delivery info, and tracking options.

items.name: pricing-plans
items.title: Pricing Plans
items.description: A pricing plan selector with monthly/yearly toggle, multiple tiers, and feature lists.

items.name: pricing-plans-grid
items.title: Pricing Plans Grid
items.description: A 3-column pricing grid with plans as cards, monthly/yearly toggle, and feature checkmarks.

items.name: inline-card-form
items.title: Inline Card Form
items.description: Compact card payment form with inline layout for chat interfaces.

items.name: inline-payment-methods
items.title: Inline Payment Methods
items.description: Inline payment method selector for direct chat use with card brands (Visa, Mastercard, CB, Amex) and Apple Pay.

items.name: inline-order-confirm
items.title: Inline Order Confirm
items.description: Inline order confirmation for direct chat use with product image, delivery info, and confirm action.

items.name: inline-payment-success
items.title: Inline Payment Success
items.description: Inline payment success for direct chat use with order details, brand logo, and tracking button.

items.name: inline-payment-confirmed
items.title: Inline Payment Confirmed
items.description: Payment confirmation card with product image, price, delivery info, and tracking button.

items.name: product-list
items.title: Product List
items.description: Product list with list, grid, carousel, and picker variants.

items.name: inline-option-list
items.title: Inline Option List
items.description: Tag-style option selector with single or multiple selection modes.

items.name: inline-amount-input
items.title: Inline Amount Input
items.description: Amount input with increment/decrement buttons and preset values.

items.name: inline-tag-select
items.title: Inline Tag Select
items.description: Colored tag selector with single or multiple selection and color variants.

items.name: inline-quick-reply
items.title: Inline Quick Reply
items.description: Quick reply buttons for common chat responses.

items.name: inline-progress-steps
items.title: Inline Progress Steps
items.description: Progress indicator with horizontal or vertical layout and step statuses.

items.name: inline-status-badge
items.title: Inline Status Badge
items.description: Status badge with multiple states (success, pending, processing, error, shipped, delivered).

items.name: inline-bar-chart
items.title: Inline Bar Chart
items.description: Simple bar chart with horizontal or vertical orientation.

items.name: inline-pie-chart
items.title: Inline Pie Chart
items.description: Simple pie chart with legend and percentages.

items.name: inline-stats
items.title: Inline Stats
items.description: Scrollable stat cards with values, trends, and change indicators.

items.name: inline-skeleton
items.title: Inline Skeleton Loaders
items.description: Skeleton placeholder components with pulse animation for loading states.

items.name: inline-blog-post-card
items.title: Blog Post Card
items.description: Blog post card with image, title, excerpt, author info and read more button. Supports default, compact, and horizontal variants.

items.name: inline-blog-post-list
items.title: Blog Post List
items.description: Blog post list with list, grid, and carousel variants.

items.name: post-detail
items.title: Post Detail
items.description: Full post view with cover image, author info, content, tags and related posts section.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Data table with optional single or multi-select modes for chat interfaces.

items.name: inline-select-list
items.title: Inline Select List
items.description: Card-based selection list with single or multi-select modes.

items.name: inline-message-bubble
items.title: Inline Message Bubble
items.description: Chat message bubbles with support for text, images, voice, and reactions.

items.name: inline-social-cards
items.title: Inline Social Cards
items.description: Social media post cards for X, Instagram, LinkedIn, and YouTube.
